title: Locational Clearence for all new ITPs proposals and proposals as per Transition Policy is to be granted by the State Government after consulting the above High Power Committee (HPC)
clause_text: Locational Clearence for all new ITPs proposals and proposals as per Transition Policy is to be granted by the State Government after consulting the above High Power Committee (HPC).
section: Permission and Declaration of Project by State Government :-
